Description: Ostracon, large section (comprising three fragments) of the body of a large red-brown pottery jar, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey-black in section, the exterior is covered with alternate bands of cream-coloured and red-brown slips and faint traces of four lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thoth 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393503) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393503)
